name: Gravies & Simmer Sauces
description: Ready-to-use gravies and simmer sauces for quick meal preparation, including classic curries, masalas, and international flavors.
usage: Pour over cooked meat or vegetables, simmer, and serve with rice or bread.

name: Marinades & Rubs
description: Authentic spice blends, wet and dry marinades, and rubs for perfect flavoring of meats, seafood, and vegetables.
usage: Coat ingredients before grilling, roasting, or baking to enhance flavor.

name: Chutneys & Dips
description: Fresh and preserved chutneys, dips, and spreads made from fruits, vegetables, and spices, ready to serve as condiments or appetizers.
usage: Serve with snacks, breads, or as accompaniments to main dishes.

name: Ready-to-Eat Meals
description: Complete, pre-cooked meals in various cuisines, ready to heat and serve for convenience at home or on-the-go.
usage: Microwave or heat on stove and serve directly.

name: Rice Preparations
description: Flavored rice dishes, biryanis, and pilafs, pre-cooked or ready to cook, offering a variety of regional and international tastes.
usage: Heat and serve as a main or side dish.

name: Frozen Breads & Snacks
description: Frozen Indian breads (naan, paratha), appetizers, and snacks, ready to bake, fry, or microwave for quick serving.
usage: Heat as per instructions and serve as snacks or meal accompaniments.

name: Home Cooked
description: Authentic home-cooked style dishes, prepared using traditional recipes and methods for a homemade taste.
usage: Heat and serve with rice or bread.

name: Freeze Dried
description: Meals and ingredients preserved through freeze-drying, retaining nutrients and flavor for long shelf life and easy rehydration.
usage: Add hot water to rehydrate and serve.

name: Air Dried
description: Naturally air-dried products such as herbs, vegetables, and snacks, offering extended storage and concentrated flavors.
usage: Use as ingredients in cooking or as snacks.

name: Individual Quick Frozen
description: Flash-frozen fruits, vegetables, and ready-to-cook items, preserving freshness, texture, and nutrients.
usage: Use directly from freezer in recipes or as sides.

name: Canned
description: Sealed and preserved foods including vegetables, fruits, beans, and ready meals for convenience and long shelf life.
usage: Open and use directly or heat as required.

name: Nutraceuticals
description: Products that provide health and nutritional benefits, including supplements, fortified foods, and functional beverages.
usage: Consume as per recommended dosage or instructions.

name: Pickle
description: Traditional pickled vegetables and fruits, preserved in oil, vinegar, or brine, offering tangy and spicy flavors.
usage: Serve as a condiment with meals.
